Name: Farina
Review Text: Such a special evening. The cocktails were perfect and coming from SF, hard to find fresh oysters. Farina has you covered. Octopus was a tad salty, but forgivable. The olives with bread were marinated with turmeric, tarragon, cumin, and …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Had an amazing date night there tonight. Everything from the drinks to the dessert exceeded expectations. We had the duck meatballs, shared the potato gnocchi with braised rabbit. My date had the stuffed veal chop with prosciutto and onion …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Farina exceeded my expectations! Service was prompt and personal and anything we tried on the menu was spectacular. The pastas we tried pushed our (limited) comfort zone of pasta and helped us discover flavors we loved! Also! Farina has standout dessert options that just make the whole experience that much better.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Fine dining feel at reasonable prices. We celebrated a birthday and sat in the gallery area. Tables were spread out which enabled good conversation. Service was perfect, efficient but not intrusive. The olives and focaccia brought …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Came here on a first Friday for our birthdays. We knew what we were getting into but the staff was quick and professional the entire time. Best oysters I have had in KC. Really interesting Italian dishes and a delicious blueberry cake. …

Name: Farina
Review Text: My husband and I went here for a date last weekend and it was amazing! We shared three of the pastas and each had different favorites. My favorite was the caramelle (seasonal) and my husband's was the carbonara. We both really enjoyed the …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Best restaurant ever!  One of the best meals we ever had! Great service ( applause for Aly) great ambiance, met the owners, unbelievable food!!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Mike and I had a midweek date night to probably the most intimate restaurant in KC.  Fabulous service, over the top wine list and a wonderful dinner.  I can’t wait to return and I highly recommend this place.

Name: Farina
Review Text:
Definitely one of the best meals I've had in KCMO.

The You Apricota Be Kidding Me cocktail was very nuanced and super flavorful. I …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Farina just became one of my favorite restaurants in Kansas City. They have outstanding food and service, and they have a wonderful, extensive wine list. If you haven’t visited, I’d highly recommend it. …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Attended a special  four course dinner highlighting St George Spirits.  We were almost late for the dinner because parking was very difficult to find.  I ran into the restaurant to let them  know we were there, just having parking …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Our experience was immaculate but this isn’t a review of Farina. This is a review of their restaurant group as a whole. …

Name: Farina

Name: Farina
Review Text: We booked their private room for my sister’s 35th birthday everyone had a great experience! The room was huge and had great views of their wine cellar which was behind a huge glass wall. We all ordered a few cocktails to start with and we …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food was good especially if you are expecting traditional Italian food. The service was fairly good, they had a full house. My only complaint would be that they require masks, but seat you literally within 8 inches of each other. Most …

Name: Farina
Review Text: February 2022 update: Enjoyed another fantastic evening at Farina.  The fresh black truffles and caviar oysters were really spectacular.  It's hard to go anywhere else with food, wine and service at this level.  The daily shipment of four …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Absolutely exquisite experience both in service and food! Besides the fifteen minute wait, even though we had a reservation, our evening was fantastic from beginning to end. Our waiter, Aaron, was knowledgeable, friendly, and had good …

Name: Farina
Review Text: All I can say is delicious, top shelf and won't find beyter.anywhere near or around here. Also very clean and the employees were super nice,helpfuland didn't let us down.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Excellent experience and delectable food. This is definitely a place worth experiencing for KC fine dining.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Hands down the best dining experience we've had since the pandemic began.   We had a party of 8 and the service was flawless.   Between the table we all had the opportunity to try several things.   All pasta is made in house daily,  meats cut on site and even cured and aged on site.   Incredible flavors from the wizard himself.

Name: Farina
Review Text: From the moment you enter this cozy tranquil restaurant, you know you are in for a truly 5 star experience. From the warm greeting at the front door to the  friendly and knowledgeable wait staff, the craft cocktails, and superb wine list, …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food and service were phenomenal! From appetizers to dessert each dish we had was amazing.  Everyone in our party of eight said they couldn't wait to come back!

Name: Farina
Review Text: We couldn't believe how amazing the swordfish was!! Everything was made from scratch and tasted so fresh. The berry cobbler and passionfruit tart were out of this world. We went on a Tuesday night and were shocked at how crowded it was. It …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The staff here is so kind and welcoming. I met the chef/owner, and it was a pleasant experience. The restaurant is a beautiful and warm decor. The food was delectable. The portion was just right. I look forward to going again.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Excellent elegant Italian. Unique and interesting dishes served in a relaxed but beautiful environment by extraordinary staff.

Name: Farina
Review Text:
Canceled my dinner reservation mere hours beforehand on my wedding anniversary.

Didn't call or text me, but rather had Opentable deliver the bad news via email, …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Anniversary dinner.. nice atmosphere.. great food & attentive service..

Name: Farina
Review Text: Agree with other reviews - the food is hit or miss. Others I dined with had great dishes, but I had the chef-recommended orecchiette and it was very forgettable. I expected a lot of umami from the burnt onions and it was just blah. Cocktails were also unbalanced and mediocre.

Name: Farina
Review Text: A gem of a restaurant in the crossroads area. Decor and ambiance is understated Italian elegance. The food often prepared by owner/chef Michael Smith, as was our exquisite meal was is some of the best I have had. This night his wife Nancy …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Excellent food & service!  It was a full house, so the noise level was fairly high.   However, the atmosphere was modern, yet warm & intimate-feeling.

Name: Farina
Review Text: My husband and I celebrated my birthday at Farina last night and it was one of the best meals we’ve ever had. He got the duck breast and I got the braised beef gnocchi, both recommended by our amazing server. We also got sweet petite …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Fabulous food. Chef has an equisite hand with the sauces. The food was satisfying without being heavy. The desserts are to die for- I wanted to order three and take them home. Everyone at our table ordered something different, and loved …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Great atmosphere, really love the interior design of the space.  Clean, comfortable.  The food was good to excellent from cocktails to wine to appetizers and entrees.  The gnocchi was a bit spongy and had an odd texture.  The proprietor stopped by and discussed the meal which was an added bonus.

Name: Farina
Review Text: For me, this restaurant is perfect.  They had a great selection of Oysters, some of the best wine I've ever had, and the menu was excellent.  The Italian Chopped Salad was an elevated take on the classic dish.  I don't usually eat veal, but …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Food was incredible. Our waiter was super friendly and helped us pick out some good oysters to try. The beef short ribs was amongst the best I’ve ever had. Overall great experience. Highly recommend.

Name: Farina
Review Text: A+ Food and Service. The balance of atmosphere, personal attention from servers, and impressive flavor combinations from renowned chef Michael Smith make this a go-to stop for locals and visitors. One of the very top restaurants in the Midwest.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Not cheap, but the food and atmosphere are well worth it

Name: Farina
Review Text: This is our "go to" place, whether a special occasion or just for an enjoyable evening.  Every aspect of the experience is impeccable.  We seldom place our own orders, usually asking Sean to bring us what he chooses.  I absolutely recommend Farinas!

Name: Farina
Review Text: The best thing about Farina is the ambiance. The service and food weren't anything to write home about. I was recommend four items: Sardinian Black Rice, Cheese Filled Caramelle, Linguini Puttanesca & Veal Scallopini only one of which I …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Farina is the most recent restaurant by Michael Smith and in my opinion it’s the best. The food is magnificent. My husband and I dined here for our anniversary. We tried the clam toast (ahhhhmazing) caprese salad, 2 pastas and the halibut. …

Name: Farina
Review Text: I have lived in Kansas for 2 years now and have been to dozen of restaurants in that time. I can unequivocally state that this was the best restaurant I have been to. The food was perfect in every way and the drinks tasted great. What stood …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Let me start off by saying that I review a LOT of resturants all over the country. I can count on one hand the reaturants that I have given 5 stars to. I'm not a fan of how Google does not allow half stars as I think nothing is perfect. I …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Saying that James Beard Award-winning chef's restaurant is great is kind of obvious. Instead, what I'll say is that for the same money as 801 Chophouse, we ate vastly better food. Pro tip: call before you go and tell them you want to order some Beggar's Purses. They will blow you away. One per person.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Delicious fine dining experience - once again Michael Smith restaurants do not disappoint! We loved the service and the food was delectable! Reservations were easy to make online - we arrived a little early and they seated us early! I would definitely go back!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Our experience at Farina was phenomenal. We ordered raw Oysters, Creste di Gallo, Aged Ribeye, and the Farina Style Chicken Parmesan. The oysters were great and each dish was incredibly delicious. Their wine list is fantastic as well. Farina is our new favorite date night spot!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Phenomenal!  Once again, the Smiths over achieve.  The pasta was prepared perfectly, the wine suggestion spot on.  We will return again and again.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Outstanding Service and Food! visited twice, Both were excellent. Having a glass of wine at the bar or dinning in; the excellent service allows you enjoy the tasteful flavors served and The great ambiance of the place.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Michael Smith has done it again. The space, the food, the atmosphere are fantastic. It's busy, lively, open and energetic. *Edit* Returned and somehow it got better. The service was amazing. The waiter absolutely knew exactly our thoughts …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Valentines Day reservation for me and the wife were at 8:30 we were seated by 8:30 around 8:50 Micheal Smith stopped by our table and spoke to us .... from the caviar to the dry aged ribeye everything was great. This was on my list of …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Absolutely fabulous food, great service,  friendly staff. I loved the pasta carbonara. Scampi was delicious,  oysters fresh and the coconut cake is the best I have ever had.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Everything from the service, to the food and drink, to the ambiance is beyond excellent. Our server was extremely attentive and answered any questions we had. The two of us decided to order the burnt onion farfalle and cacio e pepe to …

Name: Farina
Review Text: They know what they are doing here! Beautifully eclectic menu. Excellent service, excellent drinks, out-of-this-world food! Very hard to not order too much food. …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Literally my favorite place to eat in all of KC. Very modern vibes with a great clientele. The food is amazing.

Name: Farina
Review Text: I'd give it 5 stars if an unruly drunk table was asked to be quiet or leave. Food was great. Service was great

Name: Farina
Review Text: Fantastic dinner. Super busy when we were there. Recommend making a reservation but sitting at the bar was just as worth it!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Prices are to be expected for quality and environment. Oysters, Bruschetta and Pasta were incredible..had been wanting to try for quite some time and was happy that I finally did. I had the special as my entrée and was not disappointed.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Food was good, but not great.  Previous visit, some items were not hot when served.  Service was very good.  Way too loud.  Hard to have a conversation across the table.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Farina does not fail to impress! This is the best Italian restaurant in Kansas City which supports a comfortable yet elegant dining experience. (Mic) Mickayla was our server and she made this a very special evening for us on our wedding …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Tasty food and excellent service. We ordered 5 type of food and the best one was aged rib eye.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Solid Italian food with handmade pasta in a lively atmosphere. The service was par. We came with reservations and they didn’t have a table for us when we arrived. They were able to seat us after a few minutes. The food was outstanding and …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Special place for an excellent Italian meal. Great service combined with perfect food. Go!

Review Text: Farina does not fail to impress! This is the best Italian restaurant in Kansas City which supports a comfortable yet elegant dining experience. (Mic) Mickayla was our server and she made this a very special evening for us on our wedding …

Review Text: We celebrated a birthday with a party of 11, and everything was perfect. The food was delicious and our server was EXCELLENT!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Unbelievable flavors, staff was so friendly and knowledgeable. Amazing experience!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Exceptional food, incredible wine selection and the space is something that you would find in much larger cities. Michael has outdone himself with this one! This will be top of the list for special events.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Let me start off by saying that I review a LOT of resturants all over the country. I can count on one hand the reaturants that I have given 5 stars to. I'm not a fan of how Google does not allow half stars as I think nothing is perfect. I …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Hit or miss with the dishes. Some dishes are phenomenal, others I wouldn’t even eat for $5. Nothing was BAD, just some dishes are not impressive at all.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Our experience at Farina was phenomenal. We ordered raw Oysters, Creste di Gallo, Aged Ribeye, and the Farina Style Chicken Parmesan. The oysters were great and each dish was incredibly delicious. Their wine list is fantastic as well. Farina is our new favorite date night spot!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Exceptional food, incredible wine selection and the space is something that you would find in much larger cities. Michael has outdone himself with this one! This will be top of the list for special events.

Name: Farina
Review Text: My husband, 4 children, and I went here with out a reservation. I can honestly say I was extremely pleased with the service. The food was great. I just wish I could remember my waitresses name so I could give her a shout out.

Name: Farina
Review Text: This sweet place is a gem....the food is outstanding. The ribeye and the duck meatballs are wonderful, but the swordfish is exemplary!

Name: Farina
Review Text: We had an amazing night at Farina. Our waitress Katie was wonderful, she was very personable, we never had to wait for anything and she did an excellent job explaining and recommending dishes. Throughout the evening, Michael and his with …

Name: Farina
Review Text: We’ve been going here for a year now, not sure why it has taken me so long to write a review. The food is always phenomenal everything from the Ahi Tuna ceviche, oysters, pasta (favorite is the Ravioli/Bolognese/linguini), and halibut. The …

Name: Farina
Review Text: We had oysters, the crab toast, fresh pasta, and veal chop. It was all amazing and delicious. The service was outstanding. Can't wait to go back.

Name: Farina
Review Text: One of the most authentic Italian dining experiences I've had, and certainly the best Italian I've tried in Kansas City. The drinks were great, the food was amazing, the wine pairings elevated the dishes. I'll absolutely be heading back.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Absolutely one of my favorite restaurants in Kansas City. The food was amazing, the atmosphere was modern & comfortable, and our server was extremely attentive. It definitely made for a great date night!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Nice establishment, but service was sub-par at best. We had a 7:30 reservation, but waited ~20-30 mins for our table. Drinks and appetizers were fairly quick, but the waitress disappeared for a long while. After being seated for 2 hours we …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Love, love, LOVE Farina! So glad we finally got a chance to try it for a date night and much needed night out. Everything from start to finish was magnificent. We had the duck meat balls, table side Caesar salads, Cacio e Pepe & Carbonara, …

Name: Farina
Review Text: A spectacular dining experience.  Beautiful cold bar to whet your appetite, burrata with caviar for that decadent start.  Shared gnocchi and cacio e pepe, and a beautiful heirloom tomato salad, which led us to sumptuous steak, rabbit and …

Name: Farina
Review Text: We choice the menu this year. There were 6 of us and service was outstanding. We were not rushed and everything came timely. We order fresh and broiled oysters as well as soup and salads. Our entrees were varied and all delicious. We all …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Special place for an excellent Italian meal. Great service combined with perfect food. Go!

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food was quite good and a nice environment. Parking nearby wasn't impossible either.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Michael Smith does it again! As close to authentic "Italian" food you can find in Kansas City. The pasta is handmade and out of this world. The oyster bar was amazing as well. We will be back soon and often.

Name: Farina
Review Text: I don't often give five stars but eating here was an immensely enjoyable experience. Beautiful restaurant in my favorite part of town. The service was excellent. We enjoyed our experience a lot. And the food was delicious. The Missouri …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Fine dining done right. Relaxing atmosphere, knowledgeable staff, great food. Michael Smith knocks it out of the park again with a simple, flavor rich menu comprised of classic Italian dishes with modern style. Fresh pasta is the focal …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Overall the food was delicious! Loved the caramelle pasta, the ravioli was to die for, the rabbit pretty tasty, the sturgeon was ok. A little less cocoa on the tiramisu maybe. Service was slow. We were at the restaurant two hours. Our server seemed distracted and absent minded.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Simply amazing!  Our first date night since pandemic and it turned out to be our best dining experience ever in Kansas City.  Our server, David, was informative, fun and coursed our night perfectly.  Food, service, wine that David recommended... everything was incredible! Thank you - we'll be certainly be back

Name: Farina
Review Text:
Great food great service!

Yazmin, Lalo and Dan made it a blast!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Excellent service, food was amazing and server was very knowledgeable of the menu and beverages. Michael & Nancy Smith are top tier in the restaurant business and I respect them both immensely. Bartender's were fantastic, had excellent …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The restaurant lived up to its hype, as far as I am concerned. The decor was modern and sleek, service was attentive and the food excellent. We had the special, soft shelled crabs, shared 2 pastas and the veal picatta. I loved the cookies …

Name: Farina
Review Text: It was a lot of fun. The decor is great inside. Fun paintings, cozy, lively. I'm not a big Italian food person, but this was delicious. It's not a typical spaghetti and meatballs kind of Italian restaurant. Certainly more Italian than other …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Oh my gosh, when I accidently discovered this WONDERFUL totally authentic Italian restaurant, I thought I died and went to heaven.  Michael and Nancy are amazing, their changing the menu seasonally is so delish.  I will have been there …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Fantastic dinner here!  The pasta was probably the best I've had outside of Italy, and probably better than most I've had in Italy.  Unique among US restaurants that advertise "house made pasta" in that it is OBVIOUS that the pastas were …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The most delicious food ever! Very laid back atmosphere and a very cool vibe. We also met Michael Smith and took a picture with him!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Very good service until our entree came out just after the antipasti. We had the pasta with whole lobster evening special. We felt rushed, and our waiter was surprised to find it served. The lobster claws were very soggy and there was too …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Some of the best oysters I've had, and definitely the best I've had this far from a coast. The focaccia was so soft I wanted to take a nap on it. Delicious cocktails. Go here, it's worth every penny.

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food here is incredible. Seasonably appropriate and the flavors are on point. The best food I have ever had at a restaurant. Waitstaff is top notch and very knowledgeable about menu. There is nothing off about this place. If you want to make sure a special occasion is special, go to Farina.

Name: Farina
Review Text: WOW! I can't believe it has taken me this long to get here! Had GREAT recommendations from our waiter, amazing wine - this place cares so much about their wine choices, they buy the glasses the wine maker wants them to be served in (a la Ken Wright from OR).

Name: Farina
Review Text:
They know what they are doing here! Excellent service, excellent drinks, out-of-this-world food! Very hard to not order too much food.
The staff is extremely polite and professional. Every time I have been the owner and his wife have personally greeted our table.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Had the lump crab appetizer, squid ink linguini, and the peach dessert. All were exceptional along with impressive service. The lamb chop special was unexpectedly undercooked, but the server perfectly handled our displeasure. Michael Smith …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Very well done new Italian cuisine. Pastas were perfectly prepared, and everything was very well seasoned. Bar program is very solid, as expected. The space is meticulously decorated and modern, but with a lot of warmth and character. Definitely worth a second visit!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Unbelievable flavors, staff was so friendly and knowledgeable. Amazing experience!

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food, service and atmosphere were all impeccable. Would highly recommend!

Name: Farina
Review Text: I just can’t say enough good thing about Farina. From the friendly greeting, to prompt service, to outstanding food, we feel like it’s home here. The food is pure Italian but with Michael’s flair. They had a large crowd the night we were …

Name: Farina
Review Text: One of our favorite kc spots. Great atmosphere and food - always satisfied!

Name: Farina
Review Text: I would love to give Farina higher stars as the food was awesome however the service was horrible. My boyfriend and I came for my birthday and I had been wanting to go here for a long time and I was so excited. We sat down and waited 20 …

Name: Farina
Review Text: I’m not the type for reviews, but this place was 👌👌👌. Comfortable, upscale, delicious and welcoming. Kudos to the host, bartenders and chef - A+ service.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Everything was excellent!  Our server made super recommendations for our party.  We started with the duck meatballs and prosciutto with pickled cherries.  The italian chopped salad, cheese filled carmelle,  and cauliflower soup were very …

Name: Farina
Review Text: We really enjoyed our experience here. We had drinks, appetizers, dinner, and dessert. Everything was very delicious. Our only complaint was how long things took. It is likely a result of being there on a Friday evening, but the restaurant did not appear to be that busy. Despite that, I would still return.

Name: Farina
Review Text: The negatives: Lighting and music are key to a restaurant atmosphere and these are not in sync. The room gives you anxiety the lighting is so bright! We were there at 8:30pm, lighting should be low. There wasn't any music. Two out of four …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Potato Gnocchi and the Pork Roast were exquisite. Staff was attentive and excellent. Will definitely be coming back!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Farina is better in every way than Michael Smith's previous restaurant, "Michael Smith".  The room is beautiful, warm and inviting, the wood ceiling especially so.  The food was fabulous, from my shrimp cocktail, hard to mess up, but made …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Just not the best bang for your buck, my overall feeling. I had duck meatballs as an appetizer. They were pretty tasty came in a tomato sauce. I then ordered pepe de cacao,  I think its called pepper pasta. Spaghetti noodles in cream sauce. …

Name: Farina
Review Text: One more of those very fancy places that you only come in special occasions or with your company. Place is beautiful, food is delicious, small portions, the team is very professional. The Chef, Mr Michael, comes to visit you at your table and to say thank you for the visit, very nice from him.

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food and service was excellent ! The sparkling rose cocktail by Berto Santoro with the crab and asparagus bruschetta was the perfect combination !

Name: Farina
Review Text: Oysters are very good! The atmosphrere is beautiful and comfortable. Four of us dining and almost everything was great. I had the Treviso Salad and felt the duct was a little chewy, but overall taste very good and my gnocchi dish was very …

Name: Farina
Review Text: It was an amazing evening!!! Food was better than any restaurant around combined with the incredible and knowledgeable staff made for an outstanding experience!!! The staff was so passionate about the food!! Absolutely will be back!!! Every …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food was excellent tonight, especially the raw bar items. We really liked our server David. He was very knowledgeable and attentive - one of the best servers we have had in a while.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Lovely. All of it! From the moment we walked in to when we left. The nicest staff I've encountered! The food was superb and beautifully displayed. We got there and our table we reserved was still paying the host and hostess were so accommodating they brought us drinks and chatted. I can't wait to go back!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Amazing service, upscale environment, diverse menu.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Service and food is second to none! Fun atmosphere as well. Easily a top 5 restaurant in all of KC. Will definitely be going back to try new menu items. Oyster bar is a must.

Name: Farina
Review Text:
We were visiting KC and we decided to visit this place to celebrate Mother's day
It was a pleasant surprise, the food  was almost perfect (a bit salty) …

Name: Farina
Review Text: The finest food I have had in Kansas City, period. Do NOT miss the rabbit gnocchi, or you will regret it for the rest of your life. Fantastic service and atmosphere, in an amazing part of town. Treat yourself.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Amazing food in an upscale but still relaxed atmosphere. We eat here once a week with our entire family and have always had a perfect experience.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Holy cow. I'm still trying to process how incredible this place is, even two weeks after eating here. Might very well be the best meal of my life. The "burrata with ossetra caviar" was creamy, savory and decadent. The "Florida stone crab …

Name: Farina
Review Text: Lived up to the hype on most of the dishes. Nice that the popular chef proved the restaurant overseeing things and greeting guests he knew.  NPretty setting, but was disappointed that they were not decorated for the holidays. I would skip this in Dec and go other months instead.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Every course and every bite was excellent! Put Farina on your must dine list!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Outstanding Michael. Everytime we go, it's amazing. Thanks for keeping up with maintaining a high end quality restaurant in KC

Name: Farina
Review Text: Ordered Chicken Parmesan and got I don't know what?  Not what I would expect and not particularly good.   I flew in from Phoenix and friends chose this place as it had good reviews.  Unfortunately none of us were happy with our food and it was quite pricey.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Stopped in on a whim, and it was fantastic! Our meals were delicious, and we will most certainly be back for more.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Expensive of course (it's a fancy restaurant), but it has a nice environment, friendly staff, and is a nice place to take a date or host a family event. The food and wine is good as well.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Loved our server, Sean Smith! He's great! Always a great meal at Farina!

Name: Farina
Review Text: The food here is great!  It's not a place that you will get in and out of as they only have a few servers but everything I have tried on the menu has been wonderful.  At the moment, this is my favorite restaurant in Kansas City!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Celebrated my birthday here in September. Ate in the private art gallery. The food was wonderful, great service and a nice classy place.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Service was attentive and the pace of the meal was smooth. The menu is unique and the food was fresh and flavorful. Solid cocktail and wine list. Great place to for special occasions.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Service was great! Food was amazing and fresh. We really enjoyed everything down to the olives that were served on the side. Definitely going back.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Amazing food and service. Second to none.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food. Aaron was an amazing server. Highly recommend coming here. I'll definitely be back.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Wow!!! The food is amazing! Even the locals think so... If you’re in Kansas City and you love good food, good wine and good vibe... Its a must! Don’t think too much!! You have to go!!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Fantastic.  Oysters good.  Drinks good.  Scallops great!  Had a lovely experience here.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Enjoyed an amazing meal at Farina last week.  Chef Smith spoke with our table about rare truffles, it was fascinating!

Name: Farina
Review Text: Less-than-fresh oysters.  Great old fashioned.  Service was attentive. the crowd is definitely pretentious.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Well prepared entrees. Quality was very good. Wait staff knowledgeable and personable. Glad our party of 7 decided on this as an option for our dining thus evening.

Name: Farina
Review Text: Been to this restaurant twice now, great food both times. Great atmosphere,  presentation,  tasty meals and great service. Looking forward to my next meal here.

Name: Farina
Review Text: You really can't get any better. Superb pasta, great oysters, incentive food. My favorite KC restaurant.

Name: Farina
Review Text: The halibut was delicious! The carbonara was a bit lackluster,  however. The pasta was very nice, but unfortunately the flavor was missing.

Name: Farina
